trends: There has been one other sighting in Pitman
There were no other sightings in Pitman on or around January 3rd 2009
divs: sighting detailsat 11:38 pm, jan 3, 09, driving east in pitman, nj 08071, skies were clear but not able to see the stars for the town lights, but saw large object swiftly come straigt down from the sky. large green\yellow light came straight down from the top of my windshield to the treetops in the distance (about 2\3 of my windshield). i screamed out loud to my friend "oh my god, what was that?", she didn't see it. it was not a falling star, this came straight down very fast, in a second, and there was no trail\tail. {pid}
